item.description:
I am going to get a bite to eat at the POUR Farm Tavern at 780 Purchase Street.

Probably after 1:30.  Call or txt me if you want to meet up.

Kellie

 

 

Hi all, I am planning to run this. It's a fun early spring race. It's on 3/18 at 11am. We could meet up after for a bite to eat. There are some pub's within walking distance of the race finish. Here's the link to the race web-site. http://newbedfordhalfmarathon.com/
item.name: New Bedford 1/2 Marathon
